dmca.title: [ABUSE] Our clients website was copied by a customer of yours.]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 11, 2005 12:25 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Our clients website was copied by a customer of
yours.]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Wed May 11 00:24:20 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DVaHo-0007SA-Th        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 May 2005
14:20:56 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DVaGO-00078j-OY
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 May 2005 14:20:56 -0500
Received: (qmail 29935 invoked from network); 10 May 2005 19:19:28 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 10 May 2005 19:19:28 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DVaFc-0007HR-St        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 May 2005 14:18:40
-0500
Received: from dwhs60.dwhs.net ([66.249.137.60])        by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from support@dwhs.net)        with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1DVaFY-000Kvw-Ll        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 May 2005 14:18:40 -0500
Received: from [66.15.219.216] (helo=chaz5)        by dwhs60.dwhs.net with
esmtpa (Exim 4.50) id 1DVaF4-0002W9-BO        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10
May 2005 15:18:06 -0400
From: <support@dwhs.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tue, 10 May 2005 12:18:15 -0700
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;        charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1106
Thread-Index: AcVVZ4YdnfTEaFl+Sx+TYFNsy7y33QALRJqA
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse,        please include it
with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - dwhs60.dwhs.net
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - dwhs.net
X-Source:
X-Source-Args:
X-Source-Dir:
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 66.249.137.60 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of dwhs.net)        client-ip=66.249.137.60;
envelope-from=support@dwhs.net;        helo=dwhs60.dwhs.net;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Our clients website was copied by a customer of yours.
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8

Hello,

The website keralaescorts.info has copied a website from our clients
chamadi.com.

Please shut down this website for obvious reasons, they have duplicated my
clients website design.

Thank you,

Charles

DWHS Inc. Manager
http://www.dwhs.com/hostingforum
http://www.ezdomainname.com
http://www.marketingspot.com (coming soon)

Please take our one page survey here:

https://app.quicksizzle.com/takesurvey.aspx?id=663

The message is meant to be kept confidential and by reading it you agree not
to share it with public media or business competitors of DWHS Web Hosting.
For more information on our privacy and regulations please call 866 660 HOST
during normal business hours.

________________________________

From: sameer chamadi [mailto:sameerchamadi@yahoo.com]
Sent: Tuesday, May 10, 2005 6:53 AM
To: support@dwhs.net
Subject: Sub:- illegal usage of my hosting by site
http://www.keralaescorts.info -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCgZcsvK/XpJs6oyURAh0zAKCHtrifiLpm1cUGoXRG1h0Rbp2uswCgiv8l
GWtclXRRn0S5LdRANdbqag4=
=t13y
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
